ygData.subject: RE: uh oh...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, a more realistic message is suggested by their very own wording on Alenia s.  Notice it clearly does not say Alenia s Disenchanting Melody (Bard) now
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, a more realistic message is suggested by their very own wording on
Alenia's. Notice it clearly does not say Alenia's Disenchanting Melody
(Bard) now works. I says should work, implying (at the very least) that
they are not sure. It should read:

> The patch message should have said this:
>
> Alenia`s Disenchanting Melody (Bard) should now work
> Just about anything else (Bard) may now be broken

Kitasi


-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 2:27 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] uh oh...


From: jhenders@...

On Wed, Dec 01/99, Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...> wrote:
> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> The patch message should have said this:
>
> Alenia`s Disenchanting Melody (Bard) should now work
> Agilmente's Aria of Eagles (Bard) is now broken

This would imply they had some testers who had determined that Aria was
broken. I thought we'd agreed that that clearly wasn't the case. :)

--
